## Iana.loadLanguageRegistries() function

Loads language registries from filesystem.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function loadLanguageRegistries(root: string): Result<LanguageRegistries>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

root


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The root directory containing the registry JSON files or path to a ZIP file.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[LanguageRegistries](./ts-bcp47.iana.languageregistries.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A Result containing the loaded LanguageRegistries or an error.
